summary: An amnesiac gunfighter, aided by a sympathetic outlaw, tries to discover his own identity and past.
cast: Richard Crenna|Stephen Boyd|Rosanna Schiaffino|Farley Granger|Patty Shepard|Ángel del Pozo|Howard Ross|Aldo Sambrell|José Jaspe|Charly Bravo|Ricardo Palacios|Fernando Hilbeck|José Canalejas|Julián Ugarte|Barta Barri|César Burner|Adolfo Thous|Bruce M. Fischer|Peter Dyneley|Manuel de Blas
title: Un hombre llamado Noon
